verbs.description: italian food guide names best italian restaurants outside italy italian restaurant guide gambero rosso [V: has] released their picks of the best most authentic italian restaurants outside italy from paris to toronto hong kong and sydney more than 500 restaurants from 35 countries are included in the online selection of the top italian restaurants in the world with a few special mentions lumi in sydney australia for instance was named restaurant of the year for its japanese - influenced italian fine dining aromi alfonso de orléans borbón duke of galliera washington london san marzano amsterdam new zealand oakland gambero rosso bijou terroni bar centrale paris new york sydney napule paris illinois acquarello australia agerola pelago ristorante afprelaxnews italian hamburg toronto dubai tokyo miami cioppino berlin hong kong st paul restaurants beijing ciro salvo trattoria popolare macau prague enoteca turi kalò il don alfonso san francisco copenhagen garibaldi italian restaurant bar amalfi coast geneva mio chicago oslo san diego kensington vancouver osteria del pettirosso napoli sta ca mexico city singapore gallo nero bangkok fine dining lovers ristorante e bottega belotti lumi garibaldi italian restaurant bar passerini hanover iaccarino dilia fiola leonardo italy enoteca pinchiorri michele farnesi le george locanda locatelli federico zanellato il ristorante luca fantin il monaco al taglio heinz beck san giorgio
